isis.stitle: DOUBLE DIAPHRAGM MGM SPRING BRAKE - OPERATION - SPRING (PARKING) BRAKE APPLICATION

svcproc.title: SPRING (PARKING) BRAKE APPLICATION
svcproc.para: To apply the spring (parking) brake, the operator of the vehicle positions the control valve in the parking brake applied position which exhausts air pressure from the spring brake chamber ( Figure 4). Upon reduction of air pressure in the spring brake chamber, the spring brake will apply the rear brakes through the spring brake pushrod and service brake pushrod assemblies which are in turn connected to the air brake slack adjuster which is connected to the foundation brakes.

To release the spring (parking) brake, the operator positions the control valve to the released position which applies air in the spring brake chamber, thereby loading the chamber. Air pressure overcomes the heavy springs forcing the spring brake pushrod and diaphragms to the released position or normal driving position ( Figure 2).
Upon loss of air pressure or reduction of air pressure in the vehicle air system, the spring brakes will automatically apply, providing an emergency brake.
